parameter.name: filePath
parameter.description: Path of the file to be written

parameter.name: contentOrExpression
parameter.description: Static content or expression to receive content

parameter.name: mimeType
parameter.description: MIME type of the message to write

parameter.name: compress
parameter.description: Whether to compress as a zip and write

parameter.name: enableStreaming
parameter.description: Write the file in streaming manner

parameter.name: appendNewLine
parameter.description: Whether to add a new line character at the end

parameter.name: enableLock
parameter.description: Whether to lock the file when reading

parameter.name: updateLastModified
parameter.description: Whether to update the last modified timestamp.

parameter.name: maxRetries
parameter.description: The maximum number of retry attempts in case of a failure.

parameter.name: retryDelay
parameter.description: The delay between retry attempts in milliseconds.

parameter.name: timeBetweenSizeCheck
parameter.description: Time to wait between file size checks for stability (in milliseconds)

parameter.name: updateFilePermission
parameter.description: File permission to set after writing (e.g., '755', '644')

parameter.name: responseVariable
parameter.description: The name of the variable to which the output should be stored.

parameter.name: overwriteBody
parameter.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the response of the operation.
